node.name: twomonthsnologin
node.subject: No login to didactor for two months
node.body:
Dear user,
You have not been login to didactor for last two months. This is just a reminder message.
Thanks, Didactor Group

node.name: monthafterregistration
node.subject: Thaks for registering
node.body:
Dear user,
Now is exactly one month after Your registration in Didactor System.
Thanks, Didactor Group
